actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative stamp in honor of the approximately 6 million Jews killed by Nazi Germany during World War II.

summary.text: Requires the Postal Service to issue a commemorative stamp in honor of the Jews killed by Nazi Germany during World War II.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative stamp in honor of the approximately 6 million Jews killed by Nazi Germany during World War II.
